Title: Microsoft Will End Skype Internet Calling Service in May
Description: The company plans to move users of the pioneering service, which it bought in 2011, to Microsoft Teams.

Title: Tesla Fires a Manager Who Criticized Elon Musk on Social Media
Author(s): Jack Ewing, Ryan Mac and Kate Conger
Description: The employee objected to a post on X by Mr. Musk, Tesla’s chief executive and a top adviser to President Trump, that referred to Nazi leaders.

Title: OpenAI Unveils A.I. Technology for ‘Natural Conversation’
Description: The new technology, called GPT-4.5, signifies the end of an era for OpenAI.

Title: Google’s Sergey Brin Urges Workers to the Office ‘at Least’ Every Weekday
Description: The tech giant’s co-founder said that if employees worked harder and were in the office more, the company could reach an artificial general intelligence breakthrough.

Title: Nvidia’s Profit Jumps 80% as Company Rides Tech’s A.I. Boom
Description: The Silicon Valley company, which dominates the market for chips needed to build A.I. systems, said revenue was up 78 percent from a year earlier.

Title: Intuitive Machines’ Athena Lander Launches on Journey to the Moon
Description: The company reached the lunar surface in 2024, and now its second lander aims to improve on the feat. Three other spacecraft also hitched a ride on the SpaceX rocket.

Title: Tesla Shares Fall 8% as Post-Election Surge Dissipates
Author(s): Jack Ewing and Neal E. Boudette
Description: The electric-car maker’s stock has had a bumpy ride since the victory of President Trump, who has given Tesla’s chief, Elon Musk, a role in Washington.

Title: Apple’s Dictation System Transcribes the Word ‘Racist’ as ‘Trump’
Description: The company said it was working to fix the problem after iPhone users began reporting the issue.

Title: Earth’s 1st Asteroid Mining Prospector Heads to the Launchpad
Description: The dream of mining metals in deep space crashed and burned in the 2010s. AstroForge’s Odin mission to survey a potentially metallic asteroid is packed and ready to lift off.

Title: Big Day for Crypto Goes South in a Hurry After a Giant Hack
Description: Hours after Coinbase said the S.E.C. was dropping a lawsuit against it, another major cryptocurrency exchange reported a potentially record-setting theft.
